did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files on the planning of a February 1995 conference at Cornell, with keynote speakers Allan Berube and M. Jacqui Alexander. Organized by Lesbian, Bisexual, and Gay Studies, and co-sponsored by the Human Sexuality Collection.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files on the planning of a February 1995 conference at Cornell, with keynote speakers Allan Berube and M. Jacqui Alexander. Organized by Lesbian, Bisexual, and Gay Studies, and co-sponsored by the Human Sexuality Collection.
